name: Fight for Power
description:
This game was made in less than 48 hours and the theme was running out of power and in the mean time, I was running out of time.

Take on the role of a robotic human in an automation factory where all power has ran out. Steal energy from other robots or find some in power packs. Living itself uses energy so don’t be idle for too long!

Escape the offices and become trapped in a room full of energy thirsty robots. This second stage is to test how long you can live, so use energy wisely!

Use the most newest version to avoid glitches!
